content.Description: The base url for GainsightPX service. See GainsightPX docs.
The api key to authenticate against the GainsightPX service
The number of records to return from the API in single page.Default and Max is 500.
The earliest record date to sync (inclusive '>='). ISO Format
The latest record date to sync (inclusive '<='). ISO format.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
